description: Break trail to points unknown in the women's BC 6 FW backcountry ski boot. Designed for use on narrow to mid-width (70-90mm) backcountry touring skis, the boot offers a versatile, women's-specific blend of lightweight touring mobility and downhill performance. The insulated, thermo-moldable design complements a tall external gaiter and lace cover to seal out snow for warm, dry feet. A hinged external cuff adds the stability and control for exploring off-trail.<br><br>Stability, Control<br>A wide Rottefella Nordic BC sole delivers the stability and control for wider skis and varied snow conditions<br><br>Freedom and Control<br>Our Mobile Cuff optimizes fore/aft freedom and torsional rigidity for total control<br><br>Extra Warmth<br>3M Thinsulate™ heat-retaining insulation delivers increased warmth in damp and cold conditions for all-day comfort and warmth<br><br>Women's Fit<br>Our FW Fit offers reduced instep volume and narrower fit from midfoot through heel for increased comfort and precision<br><br>Customizable Fit, Comfort<br>Thermoadjustable liners can be heat-molded around your feet for a customized fit and comfort
name: BC X6 FW - Ski Boots - Womens
